H0.text: Who is the current Secretary-General of the United Nations . António Guterres

H1.text: Who is the current Secretary-General of the United Nations . Angela Merkel

H2.text: Who is the current Secretary-General of the United Nations . Justin Trudeau

H3.text: Who is the current Secretary-General of the United Nations . 潘基文

A4.text: Guterres was elected secretary-general in October 2016, succeeding Ban Ki-moon at the beginning of the following year.

A5.text: Guterres took office on 1 January 2017 as secretary-general.
